snippet: Pau Gasol blocked Ray Allen’s putback attempt at the buzzer in overtime, and visiting Los Angeles defeated the Celtics, 88-87.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Los Angeles Lakers defeat Boston Celtics, 88-87; other NBA news and results noted.
lead_paragraph: Pau Gasol blocked Ray Allen’s putback attempt at the buzzer in overtime, and visiting Los Angeles defeated the Celtics, 88-87.

headline.seo: Gasol’s Blocked Shot Seals Lakers’ Victory in Boston
headline.main: Gasol’s Blocked Shot Seals Lakers’ Victory in Boston
headline.print_headline: Gasol’s Blocked Shot Seals Lakers’ Victory in Boston
